search.title: High Bandwidth Memory
search.snippet: first HBM memory chip was produced by SK Hynix in 2013, and the first devices to use HBM were the AMD Fiji GPUs in 2015. HBM was adopted by JEDEC as an industry

search.title: GDDR6 SDRAM
search.snippet: utilize 8 GB of GDDR6 memory. Micron developed GDDR6X in close collaboration with Nvidia. GDDR6X SGRAM had not been standardized by JEDEC yet. Nvidia is Micron's

search.title: Granite Rapids
search.snippet: support up to DDR5-8800 across 12 memory channels. On April 17, 2024, JEDEC released its updated JESD79-5C DDR5 SDRAM standard that seeks to improve reliability
